titles: Essayes and characters, ironicall, and instructiue The second impression. With a new satyre in defence of common law and lawyers: mixt with reproofe against their common enemy. With many new characters, & diuers other things added; & euery thing ammended. By Iohn Stephens the yonger, of Lincolnes Inne, Gent.
author: Stephens, John, fl. 1613-1615.
publisher: Printed by E: Allde for Phillip Knight, and are to be solde at his shop in Chancery lane ouer against the Rowles,
notes: Originally published the same year as: Satyrical essayes characters and others.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Characters and characteristics --  Early works to 1800.
